name: Nymeria Sand
text: *Challenges Action:* Choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each *_Sand Snake_* character you control gains that challenge icon. (Limit once per phase).

name: In Doran's Name
text: *Action:* Kneel your faction card to gain X gold. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

name: Syrio Forel
text:
*_Stealth_*.
*Challenges Action:* Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a military icon and *_Stealth_*. (Limit once per phase).

name: Shadowblack Lane
text: *Reaction:* After you win an intrigue challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Political Catastrophe
text: *When Revealed:* Each player chooses 2 locations they control. Discard each location not chosen.

name: Winterfell Kennel Master
text: *Challenges Action:* If you control a participating stark character, kneel a Direwolf character or character with a Direwolf attachment to make it participate in the current challenge on your side.

name: Winterfell Castle
text: During a military or power challenge in which you control 2 or more unique participating stark characters, each of those characters gets +2 STR.

name: Lady in Waiting
text: Lady in Waiting may be marshaled as a duplicate (for free) on a *_Lady_* character you own and control.

name: Lady Sansa's Rose
text: *Reaction:* After you win a challenge in which you control a *_Knight_* character which attacked or defended alone, that character gains 1 power

name: Brandon's Gift
text: *Reaction:* After you marshal a *_Builder_* character, reduce the cost of the next nightswatch character you marshal this phase by ???. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Royal Entourage
text: *Forced Reaction:* After you lose an intrigue challenge, kneel Royal Entourage.

name: In the Name of your King!
text: Play only during a military challenge in which you are the defending player. *Action:* Kneel your faction card to end this challenge with no winner or loser. Until the end of the phase, you cannot initiate military challenges.

name: Brothel Madame
text: *Reaction:* After the challenges phase begins, choose a player. That player may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool. Until the end of the phase, if that player has not given you gold this phase, he or she cannot initiate military challenges against you.

name: Wardens of the West
text: *Reaction:* After you win an intrigue challenge, pay 2 gold to have the losing opponent choose and discard 2 cards from his or her hand.

name: The Reader
text: ...n unopposed challenge ...cter is participating ... the top 3 cards from ...

name: Raiding Longship
text: *Challenges action:* If you are the first player, kneel Raiding Longship to choose a character without attachments. The chosen character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

name: Rakharo
text:
While you control another *_Bloodrider_* character, Rakharo gains *_Intimidate_*.
*Reaction:* After a character is killed to satisfy claim during a challenge you initiated, Rakharo gains 1 power.

name: Crown of Gold
text:
*_Terminal_*.
Attached character gains the *_King_* trait.
Attached character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
